title: Meta’s Zuckerberg plans deep cuts for metaverse efforts
description: Meta confirmed a reduction in resources for the metaverse, and said savings are expected to funnel toward other futuristic projects within Reality Labs.

title: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg went all in on the metaverse. Now Reality Labs is facing big cuts.
description: Meta plans Reality Labs budget cuts up to 30%, weighing job cuts amid metaverse losses and renewed focus on AI technology.

title: Inside Silicon Valley’s ‘soup wars’: Why Mark Zuckerberg and OpenAI are hand-delivering soup to poach talent
description: Mark Zuckerberg’s soup is hand-cooked. OpenAI’s soup comes from a high-end Korean restaurant. It’s soup for the AI soul.
